 Perceptor::
"perceptor to Astrotain" said the blind bot"What's the situation in Maximal's base?"
  -rAuq- <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: --- Astrotrain ---

Astrotrain's side door closes quickly, nipping at Spasstik's heels 
and he transforms again into shuttle mode, rising abruptly away from 
the ground. As he reaches a significant altitude, he banks towards 
the Dark Avian, and starts heading to base.

"Dark Avian, this is Astrotrain. I've picked up Spasstik and 
Megatron, and i'm returning to base. Astrotrain out."

Astrotrain gently rises until he passes through the cloud layer. He 
levels off, and continues.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spasstik continues to pounhe ground furriously, trying to increase 
his
> speed, then quickly coils down as the train gains ahead of him. 
Then his
> powerful legs spring forward launghing him into the compartment. He
> gently walks up to the console and places the welker rifle on the 
dash,
> then begins to pace nervously, until he turns three times. He then
> collapses into a lying down position, and snarls quietly.
